title: Only prayed 2 rakats for Maghrib & realized after Isha, is my prayer valid?
transcript: uh n from Albania I have a question uh uh before a few days ago I prayed M with IM but I came one ra late then after I made up in my mind I made up the ra but actually I prayed two raas from M so in total two raas I realized this after I prayed Isa so is my prayer valid no if you only prayed two for this means that you've dropped one pillar which is a whole unit a whole ra so your is valid now you have to pray the M three Ras all together immediately this H I pray so is can I pray it now yeah you can pray it now immediately
